title: Crypto Tracker
description: Application to track potential loses/gains and view news regarding crypto currencies. Under construction, click the link below to follow my progress!

title: Blog CMS
description: User interface for managing my portfolios blog content. Unit tests were conducted with jest, react testing library, and msw resulting in 95.5% line coverage.

title: Blog API
description: REST API for creation, editing, and deletion of my portfolios blog posts, comments, and users. Integration tests were conducted with supertest and jest resulting in 99.4% line coverage.

title: Portfolio
description: Webpage for displaying my work and contact information (the site you are currently on). Unit tests were conducted with jest, react testing library, and msw resulting in 96.8% line coverage.
